md:LocalizedInfo.md:TitleSort: Little House On The Prairie: Season 8 Episode 4 Dark Sage
md:LocalizedInfo.md:Summary190: When Doc Baker's work load becomes too much for one person, arrangements are made for an African-American doctor and his wife to join the community. Racism ends up rearing its ugly head.
md:LocalizedInfo.md:Summary400: When Doc Baker's work load becomes too much for one person, arrangements are made for an African-American doctor and his wife to join the community. Racism ends up rearing its ugly head, even with the usually kindhearted Doc Baker, and when they can't find a way to get along, the person who may suffer the most is one of their patients.
md:LocalizedInfo.md:Summary4000: When Doc Baker's work load becomes too much for one person, arrangements are made for an African-American doctor and his wife to join the community. Racism ends up rearing its ugly head, even with the usually kindhearted Doc Baker, and when they can't find a way to get along, the person who may suffer the most is one of their patients.
